presets.name: Fix bugs
presets.description: Analyze and fix bugs in the code
presets.command: Analyze the code and fix all bugs you find. Explain each change.

presets.name: Add tests
presets.command: Generate comprehensive unit tests for the current codebase. Use pytest and aim for good coverage.

presets.name: Refactor
presets.command: Refactor the code to improve readability and maintainability. Apply best practices.

presets.name: Document
presets.command: Add relevant docstrings and documentation. Generate or update a README if needed.

presets.name: Code review
presets.command: Perform a thorough code review. Identify security, performance, and style issues. Suggest improvements.

presets.name: Explain code
presets.command: Explain in detail how this code works. Describe the architecture, patterns used, and data flow.
